summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.0°C) and outside temperature (down 4.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 728 m), and light levels (up 6506 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1675 m), and light levels (up 8418 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 727.7m lower than yesterday, 645.8m lower than the past week, 1674.7m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 996.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1642.4m and 2670m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
